Change Requirement Metadata.New Content: Validate repository visibility settings (Public/Private) are applied correctly during creation and reflect the selected option post-creation.

impacted_steps.step_desc: • Select 'Public' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
impacted_steps.impact: Step currently only checks for 'Public' selection. Needs to be updated to validate both 'Public' and 'Private' options, and to verify that the selected visibility is correctly applied and reflected after repository creation.

impacted_steps.expected: • Repository is created and user is redirected to the new repository page.
impacted_steps.impact: Expected result should be updated to include verification that the repository visibility matches the selected option (Public/Private) post-creation.

impacted_steps.step_desc: • Select 'Public' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
impacted_steps.impact: Step currently only checks for 'Public' selection. Needs to be updated to validate both 'Public' and 'Private' options, and to verify that the selected visibility is correctly applied and reflected after repository creation.

impacted_steps.expected: • Error message is displayed for blank repository name.
impacted_steps.impact: If repository creation is attempted with a valid name, expected result should include verification that the repository visibility matches the selected option (Public/Private) post-creation.

impacted_steps.step_desc: 5. Select 'Public' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
impacted_steps.impact: Step currently only checks for 'Public' selection. Needs to be updated to validate both 'Public' and 'Private' options, and to verify that the selected visibility is correctly applied and reflected after repository creation.

impacted_steps.expected: 6. Error message is displayed for duplicate repository name.
impacted_steps.impact: If repository creation is successful, expected result should include verification that the repository visibility matches the selected option (Public/Private) post-creation.
